dataList.name: Interlinked Time
dataList.desc: When triggering [Switch_Vibration] or [FusionVibration], trigger [VibrationExplosion] on target (once per turn per Identity)

dataList.name: Interlinked Time+
dataList.desc: When triggering [Switch_Vibration] or [FusionVibration], trigger [VibrationExplosion] on target (<style="upgradeHighlight">2 times</style> per turn per Identity)

dataList.name: Interlinked Time++
dataList.desc: When triggering [Switch_Vibration] or [FusionVibration], trigger [VibrationExplosion] on target (<style="upgradeHighlight">3</style> times per turn per Identity)

dataList.name: Emergency Investigator Badge
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #3 Deployed Identity]

When this unit takes lethal damage, their HP does not drop below 1, instantly heals 80% of their max HP, and recovers from Stagger. (once per Encounter, rounded up)
When the E.G.O Gift activates, starting next turn, gain 2 [Enhancement] and 1 [Vulnerable] at every Turn Start for this Encounter.
If the affected unit is a T Corp. employee, gain 1 additional [TimeRentalTwoPersonality] when gaining a Stack of it.
If the affected unit is a T Corp. employee, if the target has [TimeSuspend], deal +10% damage with Attack Skills.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: HP does not drop below 1, and instantly heals 80% of max HP
Gain additional Borrowed Time when gaining it
Deals more damage if this unit has Time Moratorium

dataList.name: Emergency Investigator Badge+
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to <style="upgradeHighlight">#2 and</style> #3 Deployed Identities]

When this unit takes lethal damage, their HP does not drop below 1, instantly heals 80% of their max HP, and recovers from Stagger. (once per Encounter, rounded up)
When the E.G.O Gift activates, starting next turn, gain 2 [Enhancement] and 1 [Vulnerable] at every Turn Start for this Encounter.
If the affected unit is a T Corp. employee, gain 1 additional [TimeRentalTwoPersonality] when gaining a Stack of it.
If the affected unit is a T Corp. employee, if the target has [TimeSuspend], deal +<style="upgradeHighlight">12.5</style>% damage with Attack Skills.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: HP does not drop below 1, and instantly heals 80% of max HP
Gain additional Borrowed Time when gaining it
Deals more damage if this unit has Time Moratorium

dataList.name: Emergency Investigator Badge++
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to <style="upgradeHighlight">#1,</style> #2, and #3 Deployed Identities]

When this unit takes lethal damage, their HP does not drop below 1, instantly heals 80% of their max HP, and recovers from Stagger. (once per Encounter, rounded up)
When the E.G.O Gift activates, starting next turn, <style="upgradeHighlight">gain 2 [Enhancement]</style> at every Turn Start for this Encounter.
If the affected unit is a T Corp. employee, gain <style="upgradeHighlight">2</style> additional [TimeRentalTwoPersonality] when gaining a Stack of it.
If the affected unit is a T Corp. employee, if the target has [TimeSuspend], deal +<style="upgradeHighlight">15</style>% damage with Attack Skills.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: HP does not drop below 1, and instantly heals 80% of max HP
Gain additional Borrowed Time when gaining it
Deals more damage if this unit has Time Moratorium

dataList.name: Entanglement Override Sequencer
dataList.desc: At Turn Start, for 1 Identity with the most [Vibration] Count, trigger [FusionVibration] to convert their [Vibration] to [VibrationDistribution]

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Trigger Amplitude Entanglement into Tremor - Distribution

dataList.name: Entanglement Override Sequencer+
dataList.desc: At Turn Start, for <style="upgradeHighlight">2 Identities</style> with the most [Vibration] Count, trigger [FusionVibration] to convert their [Vibration] to [VibrationDistribution]

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Trigger Amplitude Entanglement into Tremor - Distribution

dataList.name: Entanglement Override Sequencer++
dataList.desc: At Turn Start, for <style="upgradeHighlight">3 </style>Identities with the most [Vibration] Count, trigger [FusionVibration] to convert their [Vibration] to [VibrationDistribution]

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Trigger Amplitude Entanglement into Tremor - Distribution

dataList.name: Microprecision Time Accelerator
dataList.desc:
Effects apply only to #1 Deployed Identity

Applies to Identities with Skills that inflict [Vibration] Potency, Count, or trigger [VibrationExplosion].
Encounter Start: gain 5 [UltraPrecisionTimeAcceleration]
